name: Launch (Monto_13)
description:
First Game released by Ecuadorian Games Inc.

More games to come in the future

Launch is a physics based game developed with the Unity engine where you control a rocket and have to go from point A to point B. Touching anything else besides the Finish landing pad will result in an explosion.

Control-  Space = use thrust,  A = rotate left, D = rotate right, L = takes you to level select, R = restart current level

Any support or feedback is greatly appreciated
